Minimalist Excellence It's a cute game where you play as a grim reaper and have to decide which afterlife people belong in. There are plenty of easter eggs and the game gets progressively harder in the best way. There is also some type of ranking bit where you get points for different horsemen but I have no clue how it works. But I'm sure you'd like it if you're into strategic leveling.
